text: The Jerusalem Biblical Zoo, also known as the Tisch Family Zoological Gardens in Jerusalem (), is a public zoo in Jerusalem, Israel. It has all the animals that are in the Jewish Bible and the Talmud books. The zoo was established in Jerusalem in 1940. It moved many times until it moved to a permanent location near the Givat Masua neighborhood in 1993. A new aquarium dedicated to the fishes of the Land of Israel is planned for the near future. == Other websites == * *Virtual tour of the Jerusalem Biblical Zoo Category:Zoos Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:Organizations based in Jerusalem
title: Jerusalem Biblical Zoo
